author: AAA3A
name: ReactToCommand
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
This cog will interact with other cogs which can cause unintended problems. It can cause random errors from cogs due to the mock objects passed to them when executing commands.
short: A cog to allow a user to execute a command by clicking on a reaction!
description: Have you ever wanted to allow a user to execute a command by clicking on a reaction? Then this cog is for you!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
